movie.title: The Great Battle
movie.description_intro: 645 AD. Emperor Taizong invades Goguryeo with his massive Tang army. His initial target is the fortress at Ansi. After defeating a major attack by the Goguryeon army he besieges Ansi. The odds are massively stacked in Taizong's favour: opposing his 200,000-strong army is a mere 5,000 force at Ansi. It is lead by Yang Manchun, a man regarded as a traitor by the Goguryeon leader.
movie.description_full: 645 AD. Emperor Taizong invades Goguryeo with his massive Tang army. His initial target is the fortress at Ansi. After defeating a major attack by the Goguryeon army he besieges Ansi. The odds are massively stacked in Taizong's favour: opposing his 200,000-strong army is a mere 5,000 force at Ansi. It is lead by Yang Manchun, a man regarded as a traitor by the Goguryeon leader.

movies.title: The Bid
movies.summary: Loaded with a hilarious cast of comedians and internet personalities, The Bid follows Maurquis Boone and Richard "Philly Filthy Rich" Harris serving time for a crime they didn't commit. Locked up, Boone and Rich encounter a variety of hardened, yet hilarious characters as they fight to prove their innocence and make it out the penitentiary in one piece. Rich has done prison time in the past so he is comfortable during their incarceration, but Boone on the other hand, is totally out of his comfort zone and winds up violating all of the prison codes/ethics other inmates follow. Boone's nervous attitude and uneasy behavior places the duo in an abundance of hilarious jail house drama.

movies.title: Letters to Juliet
movies.summary: An American girl on vacation in Italy finds an unanswered "letter to Juliet" -- one of thousands of missives left at the fictional lover's Verona courtyard, which are typically answered by the "secretaries of Juliet" -- and she goes on a quest to find the lovers referenced in the letter.

movies.title: Back Roads
movies.summary: A prostitute and a drifter find themselves bound together as they make their way through the rural South, doing what they have to do to survive.
movies.description_full: A prostitute and a drifter find themselves bound together as they make their way through the rural South, doing what they have to do to survive.
movies.synopsis: A prostitute and a drifter find themselves bound together as they make their way through the rural South, doing what they have to do to survive.

movies.title: When Harry Met Sejal
movies.summary: The story revolves around Harry and Sejal's journey across Europe. A search for Sejal's engagement ring makes Harry understand love and relationships better. Sejal experiences new found freedom, security and solace in Harry's company and in between all of this - there is love, life, lies, thrill, fantasy and the search for the voice within.
